data.headline: Data Scientist
data.summary: Experienced professional transitioning into a data science role.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.paragraph: Performed data analysis and reporting for various clients. Developed custom dashboards and reports to support business decision-making. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and implement process improvements.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.paragraph: Managed the delivery of software development projects, coordinating with developers, designers, and stakeholders. Tracked project progress, identified risks, and implemented mitigation strategies to ensure successful project outcomes.

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance Model
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict equipment failures for a manufacturing company, reducing maintenance costs and downtime.

projects.name: Customer Churn Analysis
projects.description: Performed exploratory data analysis and built a classification model to predict customer churn for a telecommunications company.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Javier Martínez, a data science professional with a neutral, confident expression.
